title: Firefox Can not log in Bing
content: When I searching something with Bing, I Try to login,They only shows: javascript:void(0); And I try other browser.They works fine so probably the Firefox problem

title: Connecting to Firefox server
content:
Every time I try to click on Firefox is says "Hmmm. We're having trouble finding that site" We cannot connect to the server at mail.google.com" or "We cannot connect to the server at news.yahoo.com"...any site I try to connect to from Firefox gives same message.

But I can get in to Chrome and Safari and all other applications with no problem.
creator: sophiataylor310

title: Which Firefox tabs are playing video or audio?
content:
PROBLEM: After a restart of Windows 10 and re-starting Firefox, a Firefox window with a YouTube web page in a tab will start playing unbidden. When multiple Firefox windows with multiple tabs each are in use multiple YouTube videos will start playing. (Only one of possibly multiple YouTube tabs per FireFox window, I believe.) The cacaphony is annoying. Tracking down the offending tabs is difficult. (There is no "Show tabs playing media" feature in Firefox.)

QUESTIONS: (1) How do I prevent Firefox from playing media (YouTube and others) unbidden when Firefox re-starts and re-loads its tabs? (2) How do I quickly find which Firefox windows have a tab that is playing media? (3) How do I quickly find which Firefox tabs are playing media? (4) How can YouTube videos be prevented from automatically starting when a Firefox web page with that video is re-loaded?
creator: mrids

title: How can I replace the Home and New Tab with my extension's tabs?
content: I don't like the default homepage provided by Firefox, so I found an extension that can offer better tabs. But when I open Firefox, my homepage doesn't show the page provided by the extension. It's still Firefox's default homepage. Only when I open a new tab will the page provided by the extension appear. Also, the settings don't offer the option to replace Firefox's default homepage with the page provided by the extension. I need to replace the homepage from Firefox's default homepage to the tab provided by the extension.
creator: qm65285

title: not getting the data such as browsing history, passwords, bookmarks from the firefox on my other macbook
content: Hello, I just got a new macbook air because fluid was spilled on the previous one. The older laptop works but the display is not functioning. So I can't use the migration assistant, which requires responding to screen prompts, which in this case are not visible to me. I also just updated my password. Is there a way to recover this data?
creator: mrdon324

title: Remove Imported Chrome Bookmarks From Firefox
content:
Hello,

I recently bought a new computer and it imported the bookmarks that I had from my chrome account to Firefox after installing it. I already had a firefox account on my old computer and I signed into the new computer with my firefox account thinking it would make a difference but I am still unable to see my old bookmarks that were on my old firefox. Now the issue is even the firefox on my old computer was also updated with the imported bookmarks from Chrome. Please let me know how to solve this issue and get back my old firefox bookmarks back, please attach screenshots if possible.

Thank you!
creator: Sophiaaaaa

title: Settings
content:
When going to the Settings tab, Firefox shows me the message "browser is managed by your organisation". However, I am not part of any organisation, since I am a private individual.

  • What does this message mean?
  • How can I remove this message and regain control over the Settings in MY Firefox?
creator: t.jacobs

title: Opening Many Pages from History
content:
Is there a way to open many pages quickly from history?

Whenever I'm in history and I open a page, the history window closes. In order to open another page from the history I need to go back to menu > history, search through history again, and go from there. I want to open like 5 tabs real quick, as I imagine it 5 quick middle clicks in the history window without the history window closing. Is there any preference for this or extension?
creator: eric.t.hanley

title: I use to be able to see my book marks on the left side of my screen. can no longer set that up . WHY
